20110121020035.000|20110121020036.000|CC1|FOR JOINING US TONIGHT.

20110121020044.000|20110121020045.000|CC1|LOST MORE THAN JUST CONTROL OF  
20110121020045.000|20110121020046.000|CC1|THE WHITE HOUSE.                
20110121020046.000|20110121020048.000|CC1|THE REPUBLICAN PARTY WENT FROM  
20110121020048.000|20110121020050.000|CC1|DOWN 31 SEATS IN THE WHITE HOUSE
20110121020050.000|20110121020053.000|CC1|TO DOWN 79 SEATS.               
20110121020053.000|20110121020055.000|CC1|THEY WENT FROM DOWN TWO SEATS IN
20110121020055.000|20110121020056.000|CC1|THE SENATE TO DOWN 18 SEATS IN  
20110121020056.000|20110121020057.000|CC1|THE SENATE.                     
20110121020057.000|20110121020059.000|CC1|IN TERMS OF NATIONALLY KNOWN    
20110121020059.000|20110121020100.000|CC1|POLITICIANS, THERE WAS NOT A    
20110121020100.000|20110121020102.000|CC1|SINGLE SEAT THAT HAD BEEN       
20110121020102.000|20110121020105.000|CC1|DEMOCRATIC THAT WENT TO A       
20110121020105.000|20110121020105.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN.                     
20110121020105.000|20110121020107.000|CC1|NO NATIONALLY KNOWN REPUBLICAN  
20110121020107.000|20110121020108.000|CC1|FIGURES CHANGED JOBS THAT YEAR  
20110121020108.000|20110121020111.000|CC1|EXCEPT BY LEAVING OFFICE OR BY  
20110121020111.000|20110121020112.000|CC1|GETTING BEAT.                   
20110121020112.000|20110121020115.000|CC1|2008 WAS AN ELECTORAL DRUBBING  
20110121020115.000|20110121020117.000|CC1|FOR 2000 -- FOR REPUBLICANS.    
20110121020117.000|20110121020119.000|CC1|THEN CAME INAUGURATION DAY.     
20110121020119.000|20110121020120.000|CC1|IT WAS TWO YEARS AGO TODAY.     
20110121020120.000|20110121020121.000|CC1|CLOSE TO 2 MILLION PEOPLE

20110121020123.000|20110121020126.000|CC1|TO SEE BARACK OBAMA GET SWORN

20110121020128.000|20110121020130.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY APPROVING OF MR.

20110121020609.000|20110121020611.000|CC1|OUR GUEST TONIGHT.

20110121020614.000|20110121020614.000|CC1|THE REPUBLICAN NATIONAL         
20110121020614.000|20110121020616.000|CC1|COMMITTEE, MICHAEL STEELE.      
20110121020616.000|20110121020617.000|CC1|I HAVE BEEN DYING TO TALK TO YOU
20110121020617.000|20110121020618.000|CC1|FOR SO LONG.                    
20110121020618.000|20110121020619.000|CC1|>> FINALLY.                     
20110121020619.000|20110121020620.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU FOR DOING THIS.    
20110121020620.000|20110121020622.000|CC1|>> IT'S GREAT TO BE WITH YOU.   
20110121020622.000|20110121020623.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN TRYING TO GET HERE AS 
20110121020623.000|20110121020623.000|CC1|WELL.                           
20110121020623.000|20110121020625.000|CC1|SO I'M GLAD WE COULD FINALLY GET
20110121020625.000|20110121020625.000|CC1|TOGETHER.                       
20110121020625.000|20110121020626.000|CC1|>> AND THAT IN ITSELF IS A      
20110121020626.000|20110121020628.000|CC1|QUESTION I WANT TO TALK ABOUT.  
20110121020628.000|20110121020629.000|CC1|DECISIONS ABOUT HOW YOU DEALT

20110121020630.000|20110121020631.000|CC1|TIME AS CHAIRMAN AND EVERYTHING

20110121020633.000|20110121020634.000|CC1|YOU TELL ME WHAT WAS WRONG ABOUT
20110121020634.000|20110121020636.000|CC1|MY INTRODUCTION BECAUSE I BET I 
20110121020636.000|20110121020637.000|CC1|SAID THINGS YOU DISAGREE WITH.  
20110121020637.000|20110121020639.000|CC1|>> I MEAN, I WOULD DISAGREE WITH
20110121020639.000|20110121020640.000|CC1|THE SENSE THAT THERE WAS

20110121023358.000|20110121023401.000|CC1|>>> A BOMB WAS PLACED INSIDE AN 
20110121023401.000|20110121023402.000|CC1|INNOCUOUS-LOOKING BLACK         
20110121023402.000|20110121023402.000|CC1|BACKPACK.                       
20110121023402.000|20110121023403.000|CC1|IT WAS THEN LEFT ON A BENCH     
20110121023403.000|20110121023404.000|CC1|ALONG THE PARADE ROUTE FOR      
20110121023404.000|20110121023406.000|CC1|SPOKANE, WASHINGTON'S MARTIN    
20110121023406.000|20110121023407.000|CC1|LUTHER KING DAY PARADE ON       
20110121023407.000|20110121023408.000|CC1|MONDAY.                         
20110121023408.000|20110121023409.000|CC1|LAW ENFORCEMENT SOURCES HAVE    
20110121023409.000|20110121023410.000|CC1|DESCRIBED IT AS A SOPHISTICATED 
20110121023410.000|20110121023412.000|CC1|DEVICE CAPABLE OF INFLICTING    
20110121023412.000|20110121023413.000|CC1|MULTIPLE CASUALTIES.            
20110121023413.000|20110121023414.000|CC1|THEY SAY IT WAS PACKED WITH     
20110121023414.000|20110121023416.000|CC1|SHRAPNEL AND IT WAS SET TO A    
20110121023416.000|20110121023417.000|CC1|REMOTE DETONATOR.               
20110121023417.000|20110121023418.000|CC1|THE BOMB WAS DISCOVERED BEFORE  
20110121023418.000|20110121023419.000|CC1|IT WENT OFF.                    
20110121023419.000|20110121023421.000|CC1|CITY WORKERS SAW SOMETHING AND  
20110121023421.000|20110121023422.000|CC1|SAID SOMETHING.                 
20110121023422.000|20110121023423.000|CC1|THEY ALERTED POLICE, WHO THEN   
20110121023423.000|20110121023425.000|CC1|CALLED IN THE BOMB SQUAD.

20110121023428.000|20110121023428.000|CC1|DEVICE.
